name: Kiesha
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the joy always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Kiesha! You bring so much joy and happiness into my life every day. May your special day be filled with love, laughter, and all your favorite things. I am so grateful to be sharing this journey with you
text2: That's what I was going to tell.
